= (0.25 - 0.10) / 0.15
= 0.15 / 0.15
= 1.00

2022:
Cash Ratio = (Current Assets - Inventory) / Current Liabilities
= (0.35 - 0.10) / 0.20
= 0.25 / 0.20
= 1.25
